Question
========
Which statement about the R **workspace** is true?

Answerlist
----------
* The workspace is a folder on disk that always matches your working directory.
* The workspace is the set of objects currently in memory (Environment).
* The workspace is the same thing as your script file.
* The workspace is the same thing as the Console.

Solution
========
In R, the workspace refers to objects currently in memory (e.g., vectors, data frames) shown in the Environment tab of RStudio. Files live on disk; scripts are text files; the Console is where commands run.
